Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: windows | CPU: ryzen 7 | GPU: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1660 | RAM: idk

 

While trying to dock 2 craft, I switch to docking mode to be able to translate my craft, but for some reason my input's don't affect anything. This seems to occur sporadically, I'll have moments when the controls work just fine, and moment when they refuse to work. This makes it incredible difficult to do any reliable multi-craft maneuvers, pls fix

 

 

Edited September 11, 2023 by Anth12
